sources.title: The Demon (1979) CAMERON MITCHELL
sources.description:
No one can hear you scream in the dark!
It's FRIGHT NIGHT @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Cameron Mitchell, Jennifer Holmes, Craig Gardner
Writer/Director: Percival Rubens

Random people are being murdered by a sinister figure wearing a black leather glove with razor-sharp fingers. When a young woman goes missing, a desperate search leads to a psychic's attempt to end the reign of terror!

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: Similiar to HALLOWEEN and BLACK CHRISTMAS (which no doubt influenced the writer/director) this film deals with a series of bizarre murders and the unexplained stalking of the main characters by an unidentified man with no apparent motives.
metadata.Actors: Jennifer Holmes, Cameron Mitchell, Craig Gardner
